message: If you can see this text, we are having beer party tonight!!

uitests.purpose: to verify that a robot can not submit the contact details
uitests.name: verification-robot-cant-submit-contact-details
uitests.user_action: the robot is able to scroll down, fill contact details and attempt to click recaptcha box
uitests.expectation: robot can't click on recaptcha box

uitests.purpose: to verify if blogs search can search by fuzzy inputs
uitests.name: verification-blogs-search-fuzzy-inputs
uitests.user_action: the user inputs a fuzzy search keyword (netehrlands in this example)
uitests.expectation: blogs with titles matching with fuzzy keyword should appear (https://www.mantralabsglobal.com/blog/netherlands-insurance-scenario-and-technology/ in this example)
